com.zhukovsd.graphs.embedded

Class EmbeddedGraphView<T extends EmbeddedVertex<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zhukovsd.graphs.GraphView<EmbeddedGraph<T>,T>
      • com.zhukovsd.graphs.embedded.EmbeddedGraphView<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of vertex of represented embedded graph graph
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircularGraphView, HexahedralGraphView, RectangularGraphView

    public abstract class EmbeddedGraphView<T extends EmbeddedVertex<T>>
extends GraphView<EmbeddedGraph<T>,T>
    Representation of embedded graph, which can be painted on java.awt.Graphics2D object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EmbeddedGraphView(EmbeddedGraph<T> graph)
      Create graph representation of given embedded graph.
